Descriptions_of_indicators: Proportion of population below the international poverty line (1.90 dollars a day), by sex, age, employment status and geographical location (urban/rural)
Proportion of population below the international poverty line (1.90 dollars a day), by geographical breakdown
Proportion of population living below the national poverty line, by sex and age
Proportion of the population living below the national poverty line, by geographical breakdown
Proportion of men, women and children of all ages living in poverty in all its dimensions according to national definitions
Proportion of men, women and children of all ages living in poverty in all its dimensions, according to national definitions, by geographical breakdown

Direct disaster economic loss in relation to national gross domestic product (GDP)

Proportion of the population with moderate or severe food insecurity (lack of access to food), by geographical breakdown
Proportion of the population below the minimum level of proteins consumption
